definition: To investigate or explore a subject matter thoroughly, often involving scientific or systematic methods, in order to gain knowledge or understanding. This term is commonly employed when referring to the process of conducting research or in the context of scientific inquiry.

examples.english: The scientists research new treatment methods.

examples.german: Er möchte den Ursprung des Universums erforschen.
examples.english: He wants to explore the origin of the universe.

examples.german: Die Archäologen erforschen die Ruinen der antiken Stadt.
examples.english: The archaeologists investigate the ruins of the ancient city.

examples.german: Die Forscher erforschen die Auswirkungen des Klimawandels.
examples.english: The researchers study the effects of climate change.
